DOC.brief_summary: To compare corneal staining after contact lens instillation with a new MPS vs. RepleniSH
DOC.brief_title: Comfort Evaluation of a New MPS vs. Replenish in Contact Lens Patients
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients 18 yrs or older 2. Males or females 3. Any race or ethnic background 4. CL patients using MPS products currently 5. Patients using Contact Lenses habitually (at least 1 month) 1. Corneal refractive surgery within 6 months of this study. 2. Contact lens use on day of examination. 3. Corneal ectasia. 4. Current use of Restasis
